intro: Shaferocharis multiflora, commonly known as the multiflora evergreen shrub, is a member of the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of Africa and is characterized by its dense, evergreen foliage. The plant produces small, fragrant flowers that are typically white or pale yellow. It thrives in moist, well-drained soils and prefers partial to full shade. Due to its ornamental value, it is often cultivated in gardens and landscapes.
